lead_paragraph: Sources for new talent now include international locations, other professional leagues, every division of college football and even other sports.

headline.main: Melting Pot Gets Bigger as N.F.L. Seeks Talent
headline.print_headline: Melting Pot Gets Bigger As N.F.L. Seeks Talent

snippet: Sources for new talent now include international locations, other professional leagues, every division of college football and even other sports.
